caption.p: The distribution of individual ewe faecal egg counts at each sampling point for Farm 1 and Farm 2 (both in southwestern England). Boxes show the interquartile range with an intersecting median line. Whiskers display 1.5Ã— the interquartile range. Individual ewe faecal egg counts are shown as overlaid black (high estimated breeding value group) and grey (low estimated breeding value group) points. epg, eggs per gram of faeces.
